alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Grant (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 8:02PM CDT until May 13 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Grant County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 802 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Manchester, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wakita, Manchester and Waldron. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
